titleStmt.title: The court of curiositie wherein by the algebra and lot, the most intricate questions are resolved, and nocturnal dreams and visions explained according to the doctrine of the antients : to which is also added A treatise of physiognomy / published in French by Marck de Vulson ; translated into English by J.G.
titleStmt.author: Vulson, Marc de, sieur de La Colombière, d. 1665.

titleStmt.title: The court of curiositie wherein by the algebra and lot, the most intricate questions are resolved, and nocturnal dreams and visions explained according to the doctrine of the antients : to which is also added A treatise of physiognomy / published in French by Marck de Vulson ; translated into English by J.G.
titleStmt.author: Vulson, Marc de, sieur de La Colombière, d. 1665.
J. G., Gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. for William Crooke,

notesStmt.note: "A treatise of nocturnal dreams & visions" and "A treatise of physiognomie" each have special t.p. "The court of curiositie" is unpaged, the paging of the remaining parts continuous.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
